name: UpdateSolutionArticleFreshservice
description:
Update a solution article in Freshservice.

This tool updates a solution article in Freshservice using the article's ID. It should be called when you need to modify or update the content of an existing solution article.

parameters.name: solution_article_id
parameters.description: The ID of the solution article to update in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: ID of the solution article to update

parameters.name: article_update_details
parameters.description: JSON containing updated fields for the solution article, such as title, description, category, and more.

id.description: Unique identifier of the solution article

folder_id.description: ID of the folder under which the article is listed

category_id.description: Unique identifier of the solution category

description.description: Content of the solution article in HTML format

description_text.description: Content of the solution article in plain-text format

position.description: The rank of the solution article in the article listing

article_type.description: The type of the article. ( 1 - permanent, 2 - workaround )

status.description: Status of the article. ( 1 - draft, 2 - published )

thumbs_up.description: Number of upvotes for the article

thumbs_down.description: Number of downvotes for the article

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the article

created_time.description: Timestamp at which the department was created

updated_by.description: ID of the user who last updated the article

updated_time.description: Timestamp at which the department was last modified

views.description: number of views for the article

search_keywords.description: Keywords for which this article should be mapped

tags.description: The tags associated to the article

value_schema.description: Article that needs to be created

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
